word:
Chap. 95 - To W. C. White, J. E. White and wife

                                                          Lt 109, 1890 
  Evangelism in Norwich and Lynn, Massachusetts; Concern for those Who 
  Unsettle Faith in the Testimonies and Misinterpret the Scriptures 


     (Written December 6, 1890 (after the Sabbath), from Lynn, Massachusetts, to "Dear Children, Willie, Edson, and Emma.")
